alert.note: Alert for Coastal Del Norte (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 04 at 2:34PM PST until March 04 at 9:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches tonight into Sunday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, small hail and wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of one inch possible. * WHERE...Coastal Del Norte County. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 9 PM this evening to 4 PM PST Sunday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
